settings.content: For almost a decade, Puracy has won numerous awards for quality natural products tha make a positive difference in people's lives.

"After over 60 hours of research, and more than 500 swipes with paper towels on five different stains and four different surfaces, we think Puracy Natural Multi-Surface Cleaner is the one to get. This mighty cleaner from a tiny Austin, Texas, company both surprised and delighted, emerging as a front-runner in our tests. Puracy was ace at removing oil from a laminate countertop and eliminating baked-on pasta sauce from enamel. It was also among the best at getting crayon off a painted wall without taking the paint along for the ride (unlike other cleaners we tested)."

settings.text: "Safe for the Family and the Environment"

settings.content: "Puracy's products are powered by plants and natural minerals. They are safe for the family and the environment. Puracy is made in the U.S.A. You can also gift friends and family a subscription box right to their doorstep."

settings.text: "A Powerful Plant-Based Detergent That's Tough on Stains"

settings.content:
“There’s a lot to love about this plant-based baby laundry detergent, which is free of all the toxic chemicals and yucky stuff you don’t want going anywhere near your newborn’s skin, including sulfates, phosphates, petrochemicals, animal byproducts, perfumes, chlorine, dyes and optical brighteners. In fact, 99.4% of the ingredients are natural and plant-based, while still being quite effective at eliminating stains. Although unscented, it leaves your clothes feeling super fresh and soft.”

Reference: Forbes Article

settings.text: "If you are looking for the best non-toxic laundry detergent, look no further than Puracy Liquid Laundry Detergent"

settings.content:
“This cleaning solution is made with natural, plant-based ingredients, so you can rest assured it is less harsh on the environment and your clothes. It also works effectively to fight tough stains while being gentle on fabrics like wool and cashmere. Plus, a combination of powerful cleaning agents ensures full coverage of all washables. With Puracy, getting a thorough and eco-friendly clean doesn't have to be a challenge - let this natural detergent work its magic in your next load!”

Reference: Discover Magazine Article

settings.text: "The best dish soap you can buy"

settings.content: "A top-quality dish soap has a pleasant scent if it has a scent at all, cleans the most stubborn pots and pans, and is eco- and hand-friendly. Puracy Natural Liquid Dish Soap is our top pick because it's effective on grease, safe for the environment, and gentle on your hands."
"Puracy offers the best prices for the best ingredients. Safe for the whole family. All U.S.A. made products as well."

settings.text: "15 Multifunctional Items From Amazon That Will Give You a Tidier Home"

settings.content: “Versatile and plant-based, this multi-surface cleaner can work on many different kinds of surfaces including countertops, hardwood floors, and painted surfaces. It also won’t streak or leave any residue behind.”

settings.text: "Puracy Review: Nature’s Way to A Cleaner Home & Family?"

settings.content: “Puracy Dish Soap is soft yet effective, utilizing a unique grease-cutting technology from nature’s finest, you can feel confident knowing your dishes are clean and your hands are safe—no protective gloves necessary! Don’t [you] love to do dishes by hand and [not] rely on your dishwasher to do all the washing work?”

settings.text: "This Stain Remover is Actually the Most Amazing Thing I've Ever Used on Stained Clothes

settings.content: "I applied this stain remover directly onto a stain and rubbed it in. I let it set in for 24 hours, as the bottle recommends for best results. The next day, I put the shorts in the wash, and after they'd dried, I carefully examined them for results. The stain had COMPLETELY vanished. Needless to say, this handy stain remover will forever be a laundry must-have for me. If you still need more convincing, there are over 1,000 reviews on Amazon attesting to how this product has saved countless items of clothing."

settings.text: "These 6 Eco-Friendly Cleaners Are Our Go-To for Making Your Home Sparkle"

settings.content: "Formulated from all-natural ingredients, Puracy’s line ensures its products are safe for everyone in your family (furry friends included). Free from harsh chemicals, all products are made entirely in the USA, from the raw ingredient sourcing and manufacturing to the bottles and caps. The line also supports local artists who design the unique artwork featured on every bottle, with a portion of all sales helping local communities in need. Advocating for full transparency, Puracy lists every product’s ingredients right on the label; you can even head to the website to see where all materials were sourced from."

settings.text: "Puracy Stain Remover Review 2023 | Natural Laundry Stain Remover"

settings.content: “Puracy Stain Remover worked very well in lifting old and ink stains on our white clothes. We liked that there was no scent or fragrance and the wait time was 15 minutes. The ingredients, while better than mainstream brands, still contain questionable ingredients, but we think it is a step in the right direction. Price-wise, Puracy beat our old reliable Oxi Clean spray on a cost per ounce. Puracy also offers bulk purchases and refills to make the price even more easy on the wallet.”

settings.text: "How to cut the chemicals while spring cleaning"

settings.content: "Puracy, based in Austin, Texas, produces a variety of natural, vegan products, including laundry detergent, hand soap, and baby shampoo. Their biodegradable dish soap is completely plant-based, using coconut-based cleansers, as well as natural green tea and lime for a fresh scent."

“Puracy uses a blend of six plant-based enzymes to fight all types of stains, from blood to watermelon juice. In my testing it has shown amazing results against the always tricky blackberry-juice and waterproof-mascara stains — no easy feat! It doesn’t contain any sulfates, phosphates, parabens, petroleum-based ingredients, animal by-products, perfumes, or dyes. I also like that the brand’s refill pouches are more sustainable than repeatedly buying new plastic spray bottles.”

Reference: New York Magazine Article

settings.text: "Household products that won't make you ill"

settings.content: "Puracy is an American company providing household cleaning products - hand soap, dishwasher detergent, stain remover, etc. - that are free from 'harsh chemicals, petroleum, or animal-based ingredients."
We're confident you'll love our products, but if you're not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund. We may ask for feedback or a return to help improve our offerings.
